metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1739 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Ansible 2.7.16 and prior, 2.8.8 and prior, and 2.9.5 and prior when a password is set with the argument "password" of svn module, it is used on svn command line, disclosing to other users within the same node. An attacker could take advantage by reading the cmdline file from that particular PID on the procfs.

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
